alert.note: Alert for Leake; Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 03 at 6:07PM CST until January 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CST FOR CENTRAL LEAKE AND NORTHERN NESHOBA COUNTIES... At 606 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tuscola, or 9 miles southwest of Carthage, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Tuscola around 615 PM CST. Carthage around 620 PM CST. Madden around 635 PM CST. Edinburg around 645 PM CST. Pearl River around 650 PM CST. Philadelphia around 655 PM CST. Burnside around 700 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lena, Standing Pine and Walnut Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
